pkgmetadata.longdescription: # mygui 0.2.2# Caveman SoftwareÂ® 2022## lgridexample:--- import os from tkinter import Tk from mygui import egrid, lgrid root = Tk() root.minsize(300, 100) lgrid(root, 'Label placed in grid 0,0', 0, 0) lgrid(root, 'Label placed in grid 0,1', 0, 1) egrid(root, 1, 0) root.mainloop()---## egrid--- import os from tkinter import Tk,Entry from mygui import egrid, lgrid root = Tk() root.minsize(300, 100) egrid(root,0,0) root.mainloop()---
